com.aloqa.trax.shared.io.logging
Class TraXLog

java.lang.Object
  com.aloqa.trax.shared.io.logging.TraXLog

public class TraXLog
extends java.lang.Object

Use this class to control and access log messages of TraX.

Field Summary
static int LOG_LEVEL_FINE
          Indicates a log level of fine granularity.
static int LOG_LEVEL_FINER
          Indicates a log level of finer granularity.
static int LOG_LEVEL_FINEST
          Indicates a log level of finest granularity.
static int LOG_LEVEL_INFO
          Indicates a log level that prints only messages of informational value.
static int LOG_LEVEL_NOTHING
          Indicates a log level that prints nothing
static int LOG_LEVEL_WARNING
          Indicates a log level that prints only warning messages.

Method Detail

setLoglevel

public static final void setLoglevel(int level)
Sets the log level of the TraXLog.

Parameters:
level - The desired log level.

setLogListener

public static void setLogListener(LogListener l)
Sets the given LogListener as the only (!) LogListener for the TraXLog. If no special LogListener is set, TraXLog prints to stdout and stderr as a default.

Parameters:
l - The LogListener to notify about log messages.
